bug.short_desc: Scrolling behavior on OS X is broken

long_desc.thetext: Steps to reproduce: 1. Browse to http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/apiviewer/ 2. Open 5 nodes in the tree 3. Scroll via inertial scrolling 4. Observe that scrolling is anything from way too fast on Safari, to way too sluggish on Chrome
Hm, can't see the same issue here on my OSX. :( What scrolling device do you have (Mouse or touchpad)?
Built in touchpad. I'm on Lion, using current stable Chrome, Safari 5.1.2.
Hm, same as here and I can't see this behavior. What now?

Hm, I can make a short screencast demonstrating the problem, that way we know if we're on the same page. How to track it down if it happens for me but not for you (and we both use the same (== no) extensions) will be interesting.
